text:
Current CVS code does not compile.  It is dependent on an Iaik package that 
isn't part of JMeter.  In particular, the SSLManager class is dependent on it, 
and several other classes are depended on SSLManager (like JMeterMenuBar.java, 
for instance)
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
1. In the javac line of the make.bat, .\org\apache\jmeter\controllers\*.java 
should be .\org\apache\jmeter\control\*.java.

2. Attempting to copy properties files from .\org\apache\jmeter\ and it should 
be .\org\apache\jmeter\resources.
creator: markcoth@yahoo.com

text:
Sorry for the confusion. The make.bat file is the old way of building JMeter. 
Tonight, I will remove the following files in jakarta-jmeter/src: 

1. Makefile
2. make.bat
3. make.dist.bak.

JMeter is now built using Ant. See these files in jakarta-jmeter/:
1. build.bat
2. build.sh
3. build.xml

Thanks,
Kevin Hammond
creator: khammond25@home.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
